body_html: @Kaixhin Sounds good – we'll get on it! I think that what we'll do is issue pull requests one at a time. We might need a couple of days to put the first one together. We used numpy and scipy to implement our unit tests, so we will need to eliminate those dependencies before we can issue a pull request.

body: @Kaixhin Sounds good – we'll get on it! I think that what we'll do is issue pull requests one at a time. We might need a couple of days to put the first one together. We used numpy and scipy to implement our unit tests, so we will need to eliminate those dependencies before we can issue a pull request.
